Headline: Blue Line Service Delayed at Pulaski
ShortDescription: Blue Line trains are standing near Pulaski due to an unauthorized person on the tracks. Crews working to restore service.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Blue Line trains are standing near Pulaski due to an unauthorized person on the tracks.

Personnel are working to restore service. Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #115 Pullman/115th Temporary Reroute at 115th/Wentworth
ShortDescription: 115 Pullman/115th buses are temporarily rerouted via 115th, Halsted, 111th, State, and 115th due to, street blockage near 115th/Wentworth.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#115 Pullman/115th buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via 115th, Halsted, 111th, State, and 115th due to, street blockage near 115th/Wentworth.

Allow extra travel time.
